metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4722 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the OCS Reports WebInterface in OCS Inventory NG allow remote attackers to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
